subject: Dear Sir,
body:
Dear Sir,
My name is Dr. Abraham Olofin, a Chartered Accountant and a Forensic
Auditor attached to the Financial Institutions of the Federal Republic
of Nigeria.
Recently, in the cause of my activity in one of the financial houses,
I discovered a huge amount of money in foreign currency belonging to
the late ABBA KYARI,(A close associate of the President) who suddenly
died of Covid-19.
I want to make you a beneficiary of part of the fund upon your
approval. That you are one of the beneficiary to one of the pending
payments with your details, hence this email to you.
As at this moment, I am at the position of working it out on your
approval. I expect your earliest response to this email with your
telephone numbers to enable a private discussion prior to the next
line of action.
Best Regards,
Dr. Abraham Olofin
(Chartered Account & Auditor)

subject: Re:   Dear Sir,
body:
Hello Dr. Abraham Olofin,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, your job as a Chartered Accountant and Forensic Auditor sounds very interesting! 

I'm sorry to hear about the passing of ABBA KYARI. It's always sad when someone passes away unexpectedly.

You mentioned that there is a large amount of money in foreign currency involved. Could you please provide more details about this? How did it come to be in the possession of Mr. Kyari?

Also, could you explain what you mean by me being part of the fund upon my approval? What exactly would this entail?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Merle
